rules_text:
[i]Light of Etruria[/i] – When Elffin, Truth Beholden enters, exile up to one target enchantment.
[i]Angelic Robe[/i] – If a source you don't control would deal noncombat damage to a permanent you control, it deals 2 less damage to that permanent.
[i]Strategic Sonnet[/i] – {T}: Untap target creature that attacked this turn, put a shield counter on them.
